alert.note: Alert for Tuscarawas (Ohio) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Pittsburgh (Western Pennsylvania and East Central Ohio)
info.headline: Flood Warning issued February 26 at 6:23AM EST until March 02 at 5:30AM EST by NWS Pittsburgh
info.description: ...FLOOD WARNING IN EFFECT UNTIL 815 AM EST THIS MORNING... * WHAT...Flooding caused by previous excessive rainfall is expected. * WHERE...A portion of east central Ohio, including the following county, Tuscarawas near the Dover Dam. * WHEN...Until 815 AM EST. * IMPACTS...Flooding of rivers, specifically the Dover Dam Tailwater is imminent or occurring. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS... - At 621 AM EST, gauge reports indicated heavy rain. Flooding is already occurring in the warned area. - Some locations that will experience flooding include... New Philadelphia and Dover. - http://www.weather.gov/safety/flood
info.instruction: Turn around, don`t drown when encountering flooded roads. Most flood deaths occur in vehicles.
